Instruction: Preheat the oven to 360 degrees F (180 degrees C).
Prepare a 9x13-inch baking dish by greasing it with butter.
Combine the flour, sugar, milk, olive oil, orange juice, orange zest, eggs, baking powder, vanilla extract, and nutmeg in a large bowl until the batter is thoroughly mixed.
Bake in preheated oven until golden and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 40 to 50 minutes.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center of the cake comes out clean, around 30 minutes. Allow the cake to cool before serving.
After the cake has cooled down, top it with Avon's Warm Orange Sauce and enjoy!
